description.english: In an Adventure, have full HP after defeat a Boss.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，满血击败任意首领。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，滿血擊敗任意首領。

description.english: In an Adventure, keep 15 cards or more in hand at the end of your turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，回合结束时，保留了15张手牌以上。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，回合結束時，保留了15張手牌以上。

description.english: In an Adventure, discard 3 or more cards exceeding your maximum hand size.
description.schinese: 冒险模式回合结束时，因手牌溢出而至少丢弃3张手牌。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式回合結束時，因手牌溢出而至少丟棄3張手牌。

description.english: In an Adventure, win a combat against a Boss lasting 30 turns or more.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，在30回合之后击败任意首领。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，在30回合之後擊敗任意首領。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat a Boss when the Boss controls 6 creatures.
description.schinese: 冒险模式击败任意首领时，它控制6个生物。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式擊敗任意首領時，它控制6個生物。

description.english: In an Adventure, a friendly creature has 30 or more Attack.
description.schinese: 冒险模式战斗中任一友方生物攻击力大于等于30点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式戰鬥中任一友方生物攻擊力大於等於30點。

description.english: In an Adventure, a friendly creature has 60 or more Attack.
description.schinese: 冒险模式战斗中任一友方生物攻击力大于等于60点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式戰鬥中任一友方生物攻擊力大於等於60點。

description.english: Equip a friendly unit with two identical Items.
description.schinese: 为一名友方单位装备两个同名装备。
description.tchinese: 為一名友方單位裝備兩個同名裝備。

description.english: Win a combat with 1 HP remaining.
description.schinese: 我方生命值为1点时赢下战斗。
description.tchinese: 我方生命值為1點時贏下戰鬥。

description.english: In an Adventure, win a combat with no Creatures on the battlefield.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，战斗胜利时双方场上都没有生物。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，戰鬥勝利時雙方場上都沒有生物。

description.english: In an Adventure, win a combat with 2 or less Max Mana.
description.schinese: 冒险模式击败任意对手时，法力上限不高于2。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式擊敗任意對手時，法力上限不高於2。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat a Boss when you have 60 HP or more.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中击败任意首领时剩余生命不低于60点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中擊敗任意首領時剩餘生命不低於60點。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat a Boss when you have 100 HP or more.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中击败任意首领时剩余生命不低于100点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中擊敗任意首領時剩餘生命不低於100點。

description.english: In an Adventure, destroy 6 enemy creatures in a single turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中一回合内至少消灭6个敌方生物。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中一回合內至少消滅6個敵方生物。

description.english: In an Adventure, destroy 20 or more enemy creatures in a combat.
description.schinese: 冒险模式一场战斗中至少消灭20个敌方生物。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式一場戰鬥中至少消滅20個敵方生物。

description.english: NIn an Adventure, Overload (8) or more in a single turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式回合结束时：本回合内透支大于等于8点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式回合結束時：本回合內透支大於等於8點。

description.english: In an Adventure, shuffle 5 or more times during a combat and win.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，胜利时洗牌大于等于5次。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，勝利時洗牌大於等於5次。

description.english: In an Adventure, play 10 or more Hands in a single turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中一回合内打出10张手牌以上。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中一回合內打出10張手牌以上。

displayName.tchinese: 冒險模式中一回合內至少抽20張牌。

description.english: In an Adventure, draw 20 or more cards in a single turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中一回合内至少抽20张牌。
description.tchinese: 魔術時刻

displayName.tchinese: 冒險模式中一回合內對對手造成60點傷害及以上。

description.english: In an Adventure, deal 60 or more damage to your opponent in a single turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中一回合内对对手造成60点伤害及以上。
description.tchinese: 毀滅

description.english: In an Adventure, restore 50 or more HP to your hero in a combat.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中一场战斗内英雄回复50点生命及以上。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中一場戰鬥內英雄回復50點生命及以上。

description.english: In an Adventure, have 20 Max Mana.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中法力上限达到20点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中法力上限達到20點。

description.english: In an Adventure, have 24 or more Mana.
description.schinese: 冒险模式在一场战斗中法力达到24点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式在一場戰鬥中法力達到24點。

description.english: In an Adventure, keep 5 or more Unspawned Curses in Hand.
description.schinese: 冒险模式战斗中，手牌持有5张及以上非衍生心魔卡。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式戰鬥中，手牌持有5張及以上非衍生心魔卡。

description.english: In an Adventure, deal 100 or more damage to enemy creatures in a single turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，一回合内对敌方生物至少造成100点总伤害。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，一回合內對敵方生物至少造成100點總傷害。

description.english: In an Adventure, deal 60 or more Trample damage in a single time.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，任一己方生物的单次透骨伤害至少60点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，任一己方生物的單次透骨傷害至少60點。

description.english: In an Adventure, draw 5 or more Spell cards in a single turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，一回合内至少抽到5张魔法卡。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，一回合內至少抽到5張魔法卡。

description.english: In an Adventure, control 6 creature in the first turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，第一回合结束时己方场上拥有6个生物。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，第一回合結束時己方場上擁有6個生物。

description.english: In an Adventure, win a combat without dealing Attack Damage to your opponent.
description.schinese: 冒险模式获胜时，没有对对手造成攻击伤害。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式獲勝時，沒有對對手造成攻擊傷害。

description.english: In an Adventure, deal 100 or more damage to enemy creatures by a creature in a single turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中任一友方生物在一回合内对敌方生物造成大于等于100点伤害。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，卡組裡同時包含火系、木系和水系的卡牌。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with a deck containing Wood, Fire and Water cards.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，卡组里同时包含火系、木系和水系的卡牌。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，卡組裡同時包含火系、木系和水系的卡牌。

description.english: Complete an InfernotⅢ Adventure with a Hero of Wood.
description.schinese: 使用木系英雄通关一次噩梦3。
description.tchinese: 使用木系英雄通關一次噩夢3。

description.english: Complete an InfernotⅢ Adventure with a Hero of Water.
description.schinese: 使用水系英雄通关一次噩梦3。
description.tchinese: 使用水系英雄通關一次噩夢3。

description.english: Complete an InfernotⅢ Adventure with a Hero of Fire.
description.schinese: 使用火系英雄通关一次噩梦3。
description.tchinese: 使用火系英雄通關一次噩夢3。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat 8 Monsters or more and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少挑战过8次【小怪】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少挑戰過8次【小怪】。

description.english: In an Adventure, challenge [Elite Cell] 3 times or more and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少挑战过3次野外【精英】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少挑戰過3次野外【精英】。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with 7 or more Curses.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，牌组中心魔卡数量大于等于7。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，牌組中心魔卡數量大於等於7。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with a deck of 54 or more cards.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，牌组卡牌数量大于等于54张。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，牌組卡牌數量大於等於54張。

description.english: In an Adventure, enter the [Sunwell] 4 times or more and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，进入【太阳井】次数大于等于4。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，進入【太陽井】次數大於等於4。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with 3 or more Epic Item cards in your deck.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，牌组里拥有3张及以上橙色品质的装备卡。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，牌組裡擁有3張及以上橙色品質的裝備卡。

description.english: In an Adventure, win 1000 or more Gold in [Roulette] and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，通过【幸运轮盘】至少获得1000金币
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，通過【幸運輪盤】至少獲得1000金幣。

description.english: Complete any Nightmare Round with 20 or more Master Creature Cards.
description.schinese: 梦魇模式打通任一轮回时，至少拥有20个进阶生物。
description.tchinese: 夢魘模式打通任一輪回時，至少擁有20個進階生物。

description.english: Complete a game with 35 or less Max HP.
description.schinese: 通关时，生命上限不高于35点。
description.tchinese: 通關時，生命上限不高於35點。

description.english: Complete a game with cards all Upgraded.
description.schinese: 通关时，牌组所有卡牌均已升级。
description.tchinese: 通關時，牌組所有卡牌均已升級。

description.english: Complete an Adventure.
description.schinese: 首次通关冒险模式任一难度。
description.tchinese: 首次通關冒險模式任一難度

description.english: Complete a game without entering [Moonwell] or [Sunwell].
description.schinese: 通关时，从未进入过【月亮井】和【太阳井】。
description.tchinese: 通關時，從未進入過【月亮井】和【太陽井】。

description.english: Complete a game with no duplicates in your deck.
description.schinese: 通关时，牌组中不含同名卡（包括升级卡）。
description.tchinese: 通關時，牌組中不含同名卡（包括升級卡）。

description.english: Complete a game without creatures of 4 or more Cost in your deck.
description.schinese: 通关时，牌组中生物卡皆不超过3费。
description.tchinese: 通關時，牌組中生物卡皆不超過3費。

description.english: Complete a game with 8 cards or less.
description.schinese: 通关时，卡组卡牌数量不超过8张。
description.tchinese: 通關時，卡組卡牌數量不超過8張。

description.english: Gold is 0 when complete a game.
description.schinese: 通关时，持有金币为0。
description.tchinese: 通關時，持有金幣為0。

description.english: HP is full when complete a game.
description.schinese: 通关时血量为满。
description.tchinese: 通關時血量為滿。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with 18 or more Relics.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，携带大于等于18个冒险道具。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，攜帶大於等於18個冒險道具。

description.english: Complete a Nightmare with 35 or more Relics.
description.schinese: 梦魇模式通关时，携带大于等于35个冒险道具。
description.tchinese: 夢魘模式通關時，攜帶大於等於35個冒險道具。

description.english: Complete a HardⅢ Adventure without using any Scrolls or Runestones.
description.schinese: 通关冒险模式困难3难度时，从未使用过卷轴和符石。
description.tchinese: 通關冒險模式困難3難度時，從未使用過卷軸和符石。

description.english: Complete a InfernotⅢ Adventure without using any Scrolls or Runestones.
description.schinese: 通关冒险模式噩梦3难度时，从未使用过卷轴和符石。
description.tchinese: 通關冒險模式噩夢3難度時，從未使用過卷軸和符石。

description.english: Complete a Nightmare without using any Runestones.
description.schinese: 通关梦魇模式时，从未使用过符石。
description.tchinese: 通關夢魘模式時，從未使用過符石。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with Level 20 or higher.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，达到20级。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，達到20級。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with Level 35 or higher.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，达到35级。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，達到35級。

description.english: Complete a Nightmare with Level 60 or higher.
description.schinese: 梦魇模式通关时，达到60级。
description.tchinese: 夢魘模式通關時，達到60級。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with 100 or more Max HP.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，生命上限达到100点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，生命上限達到100點。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with 130 or more Max HP.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，生命上限达到130点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，生命上限達到130點。

description.english: Complete a Nightmare with 200 or more Max HP.
description.schinese: 梦魇模式通关时，生命上限达到200点。
description.tchinese: 夢魘模式通關時，生命上限達到200點。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with a Score of 1800 or more.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，积分达到1800分。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，積分達到1800分。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with a Score of 2200 or more.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，积分达到2200分。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，積分達到2200分。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with a Score of 7000 or more.
description.schinese: 梦魇模式通关时，积分达到7000分。
description.tchinese: 夢魘模式通關時，積分達到7000分。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with 1200 or more Gold.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，持有超过1200金币。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，持有超過1200金幣。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with 1800 or more Gold.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，持有超过1800金币。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，持有超過1800金幣。

description.english: Comlete a Nightmare with 3000 or more Gold.
description.schinese: 梦魇模式通关时，持有超过3000金币。
description.tchinese: 夢魘模式通關時，持有超過3000金幣。

description.english: Train a hero to Max Rank.
description.schinese: 将1个英雄强化到满级。
description.tchinese: 將1個英雄強化到滿級。

description.english: Train 12 heroes to Max Rank.
description.schinese: 将12个英雄强化到满级。
description.tchinese: 將12個英雄強化到滿級。

description.english: Unlock 2 Wood heroes.
description.schinese: 解锁2个木系英雄。
description.tchinese: 解鎖2個木系英雄。

description.english: Unlock 4 Wood heroes.
description.schinese: 解锁4个木系英雄。
description.tchinese: 解鎖4個木系英雄。

description.english: Unlock 2 Water heroes.
description.schinese: 解锁2个水系英雄。
description.tchinese: 解鎖2個水系英雄。

description.english: Unlock 4 Water heroes.
description.schinese: 解锁4个水系英雄。
description.tchinese: 解鎖4個水系英雄。

description.english: Unlock 2 Fire heroes.
description.schinese: 解锁2个火系英雄。
description.tchinese: 解鎖2個火系英雄。

description.english: Unlock 4 Fire heroes.
description.schinese: 解锁4个火系英雄。
description.tchinese: 解鎖4個火系英雄。

description.english: Unlock 75 Wood cards.
description.schinese: 收集75张木系卡牌。
description.tchinese: 收集75張木系卡牌。

description.english: Unlock 85 Wood cards.
description.schinese: 收集85张木系卡牌。
description.tchinese: 收集85張木系卡牌。

description.english: Unlock 75 Water cards.
description.schinese: 收集75张水系卡牌。
description.tchinese: 收集75張水系卡牌。

description.english: Unlock 85 Water cards.
description.schinese: 收集85张水系卡牌。
description.tchinese: 收集85張水系卡牌。

description.english: Unlock 75 Fire cards.
description.schinese: 收集75张火系卡牌。
description.tchinese: 收集75張火系卡牌。

description.english: Unlock 85 Fire cards.
description.schinese: 收集85张火系卡牌。
description.tchinese: 收集85張火系卡牌。

description.english: Unlock 70 Items.
description.schinese: 收集70张装备卡。
description.tchinese: 收集70張裝備卡。

description.english: Unlock 75 Items.
description.schinese: 收集75张装备卡。
description.tchinese: 收集75張裝備卡。

description.english: Unlock 105 Relics.
description.schinese: 收集105种冒险道具。
description.tchinese: 收集105種冒險道具。

description.english: Unlock 115 Relics.
description.schinese: 收集115种冒险道具。
description.tchinese: 收集115種冒險道具。

description.english: Unlock 5 Cardback.
description.schinese: 收集5个卡背。
description.tchinese: 收集5個卡背

description.english: Unlock 8 Cardback.
description.schinese: 收集8个卡背。
description.tchinese: 收集8個卡背

description.english: Complete 13 Adventures as a Wood hero.
description.schinese: 木系英雄通关冒险模式13次。
description.tchinese: 木系英雄通關冒險模式13次。

description.english: Complete 26 Adventures as a Wood hero.
description.schinese: 木系英雄通关冒险模式26次。
description.tchinese: 木系英雄通關冒險模式26次。

description.english: Complete 13 Adventures as a Water hero.
description.schinese: 水系英雄通关冒险模式13次。
description.tchinese: 水系英雄通關冒險模式13次。

description.english: Complete 26 Adventures as a Water hero.
description.schinese: 水系英雄通关冒险模式26次。
description.tchinese: 水系英雄通關冒險模式13次。

description.english: Complete 13 Adventures as a Fire hero.
description.schinese: 火系英雄通关冒险模式13次。
description.tchinese: 火系英雄通關冒險模式13次。

description.english: Complete 26 Adventures as a Fire hero.
description.schinese: 火系英雄通关冒险模式26次。
description.tchinese: 火系英雄通關冒險模式26次。

description.english: Complete 1 Nightmare as a Wood hero.
description.schinese: 木系英雄通关梦魇模式1次。
description.tchinese: 木系英雄通關夢魘模式1次。

description.english: Complete 3 Nightmare as a Wood hero.
description.schinese: 木系英雄通关梦魇模式3次。
description.tchinese: 木系英雄通關夢魘模式3次。

description.english: Complete 1 Nightmare as a Water hero.
description.schinese: 水系英雄通关梦魇模式1次。
description.tchinese: 水系英雄通關夢魘模式1次。

description.english: Complete 3 Nightmare as a Water hero.
description.schinese: 水系英雄通关梦魇模式3次。
description.tchinese: 水系英雄通關夢魘模式3次。

description.english: Complete 1 Nightmare as a Fire hero.
description.schinese: 火系英雄通关梦魇模式1次
description.tchinese: 火系英雄通關夢魘模式1次。

description.english: Complete 3 Nightmare as a Fire hero.
description.schinese: 火系英雄通关梦魇模式3次
description.tchinese: 火系英雄通關夢魘模式3次。

description.english: in an Adventure, enter [Holy Obelisk] 10 times or more and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少进入过10次【封印柱】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少進入過10次【封印柱】。

description.english: In an Adventure, enter [Storehouse] twice and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少进入过2次【冒险者仓库】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少進入過2次【冒險者倉庫】。

description.english: In an Adventure, enter [Unknown Cell] 20 times or more and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少进入过20次【随机事件】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少進入過20次【隨機事件】。

description.english: In an Adventure, enter [Portal] 10 times or more and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少进入过10次【传送门】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少進入過10次【傳送門】。

description.english: In an Adventure, enter [Nameless Grave] 3 times or more and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少拜访过3次【陨落的勇士】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少拜訪過3次【隕落的勇士】。

description.english: In an Adventure, enter 20 or more [Empty Cell]s and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少走过20次未经过的空地。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少走過20次未經過的空地。

description.english: In an Adventure, gain 10 or more Scrolls and comlete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，本次冒险至少获得10张卷轴。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，本次冒險至少獲得10張卷軸。

description.english: In an Adventure, make 3 or more Runestones and complete the game.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，制作了3次符石。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，製作了3次符石。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat a Boss within 8 turns.
description.schinese: 险模式中8回合内击败任意首领。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中8回合內擊敗任意首領。

description.english: Win a combat without playing any Creature Cards.
description.schinese: 不使用生物卡赢下战斗。
description.tchinese: 不使用生物卡贏下戰鬥。

description.english: Win a combat in your opponent's turn.
description.schinese: 在怪物的回合将其击杀。
description.tchinese: 在怪物的回合將其擊殺。

description.english: In an Adventure, your Deck and Graveyard are both empty.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中墓地和牌库数量同时为0。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中墓地和牌庫數量同時為0。

description.english: Complete an Adventure with 8 or more Upgraded Relics.
description.schinese: 冒险模式通关时，至少拥有8个升到2级的道具。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式通關時，至少擁有8個升到2級的道具。

description.english: In an Adventure, buy all the goods in a [Goblin's Shop].
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，在地精商店里买光所有商品。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，在地精商店裡買光所有商品。

description.english: Obtain [Stone-Skin Amulet].
description.schinese: 获得装备【泰坦结界】。
description.tchinese: 獲得裝備【泰坦結界】。

description.english: Obtain a [Cursed Blade].
description.schinese: 获得任意一把【魔剑】。
description.tchinese: 獲得任意一把【魔劍】。

description.english: Obtain [Bat Dagger].
description.schinese: 获得装备【蝠牙匕】。
description.tchinese: 獲得裝備【蝠牙匕】

description.english: Obtain [Immortality Badge].
description.schinese: 获得装备【不朽者徽记】。
description.tchinese: 獲得裝備【不朽者徽記】

description.english: In an Adventure, beat [Grove Pixie] when its Max Mana is less than 6.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中对战【林地妖精】时法力上限不超过5。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中對戰【林地妖精】時法力上限不超過5。

description.english: In an Adventure, Destroy 8 or more [Treasure Chest] in the combat against [Hoarding Dragon].
description.schinese: 冒险模式中对战【藏宝巨龙】时打破8个【宝箱】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中對戰【藏寶巨龍】時打破8個【寶箱】。

description.english: In an Adventure, Defeat [Void Shadow] before the 15th turn.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中对战【虚空之影】时15回合前将其击杀。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中對戰【虛空之影】時15回合前將其擊殺。

description.english: In an Adventure, Destroy 7 kinds of [Evil Skeleton] in the combat against [Necromancer].
description.schinese: 冒险模式中和【死灵法师】对战时，消灭七种【死灵生物】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中和【死靈法師】對戰時，消滅七種【死靈生物】

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Pharaoh] with 6 [Mummy Coffin] on his battlefield.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，与【法老王】对战获胜时，敌方场上有6个【木乃伊之棺】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，與【法老王】對戰獲勝時，敵方場上有6個【木乃伊之棺】。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Baphomet] with your Max Mana is 8 or more.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中击败【巴风特】时，法力上限不低于8点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中擊敗【巴風特】時，法力上限不低於8點。

description.english: Defeated by [The Mirror] in an Adventure.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中被【镜像】击败。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中被【鏡像】擊敗。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [King of the Sea] in a combat lasting 20 turns or more.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，20回合之后击败【海皇】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，20回合之後擊敗【海皇】。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Festeroots] when it controls a creature of 6 or more Cost.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中击败【腐树长老】时，它控制着6费以上的生物。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中擊敗【腐樹長老】時，它控制著6費以上的生物。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Fallen Angel] when he has 15 or more Max Mana.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中击败【六翼堕天使】时，其法力上限不低于15点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中擊敗【六翼墮天使】時，其法力上限不低於15點。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Dragonlord of Flame] when you control 5 full-Life creatures.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，击败【熔火巨龙】时，己方至少操控5个满血生物。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，擊敗【熔火巨龍】時，己方至少操控5個滿血生物。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Gorgon] when you control 6 creatures.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，击败【蛇发女妖】时，己方场上有6个生物。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，擊敗【蛇發女妖】時，己方場上有6個生物。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Mammon the Famine] after he has been healed 30 or more HP by his Special Power.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中击败【饥荒恶魔-玛蒙】时，其本局内总回血不少于30点。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中擊敗【饑荒惡魔-瑪蒙】時，其本局內總回血不少於30點。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Bileth the Death] and he has never use his Special Power.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中击败【死亡恶魔-德斯】时，其未使用过英雄技能。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中擊敗【死亡惡魔-德斯】時，其未使用過英雄技能。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Lilith the Plague] with 6 [Plague Carrier] on your battlefield.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，获胜时你的战场上有6个【瘟疫傀儡】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，獲勝時你的戰場上有6個【瘟疫傀儡】。

description.english: In an Adventure, defeat [Abaddon the War].
description.schinese: 冒险模式中，击败【战争恶魔-亚巴顿】。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中，擊敗【戰爭惡魔-亞巴頓】。

description.english: In an Adventure, Win the Final combat before the Boss turns into the Final Form.
description.schinese: 冒险模式中在任意第三层首领未进入第二形态前便击败它。
description.tchinese: 冒險模式中在任意第三層首領未進入第二形態前便擊敗它。
